title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 3x faster data migration with AWS Data Transfer Terminal (MAM224)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Data Transfer Terminal 实现 3 倍速度的数据迁移 (MAM224)
abstract: Discover how AWS Data Transfer Terminal is transforming large-scale data migrations in this dynamic lightning talk. Through 100 Gbps fiber optic connections, secure private facilities, and customer-controlled devices, Data Transfer Terminal delivers unprecedented efficiency and security for your most demanding data transfer needs. Through real-world case studies and comparisons with existing AWS transfer services, you'll learn how Data Transfer Terminal can advance your enterprise data migration strategy, enabling faster, more secure, and scalable transfers.
abstract_cn: 在这场充满活力的闪电演讲中，探索 AWS Data Transfer Terminal 如何改变大规模数据迁移。通过 100 Gbps 光纤连接、安全的私有设施和客户控制的设备，Data Transfer Terminal 为您最苛刻的数据传输需求提供前所未有的效率和安全性。通过真实案例研究以及与现有 AWS 传输服务的比较，您将了解 Data Transfer Terminal 如何推进您的企业数据迁移策略，实现更快、更安全和可扩展的传输。
